name: Defender like
description:
In this project you can see:

  •  classical side-scrolling spaceship with reverse button
  • randomly enemies generated on the entire map
  • looping map
  • procedurally generated mountains each wave
  • wave system

More features WIP.

You can follow me on Twitter if you like: https://twitter.com/pixelFireXY

Thank you 3dJeebs for the free asset in the Unity asset store.
